name: The Magical Adventures of Crystal Paul
name_original: The Magical Adventures of Crystal Paul
description:
Once a thriving location brimming with magical energy, Maelin's Mansion has since fallen into disarray when the evil Plasmalice kidnapped his own creator to claim the magic for himself. Now it's up to Crystal Paul to reclaim the lost Crystal Stars from the magical worlds created by Plasmalice and the captive Maelin.

Basic Controls

Movement - WASD / Left Stick

Jump - Space / A (Xbox) / Cross (PS)

Special Action - Left Shift / B (Xbox) / Circle (PS)

Camera Control - Mouse / Right Stick

Pause -  Special Right

Scroll Level Select While Paused - Q and E / LB and RB (Xbox) / L1 and R1 (PS)

Special Manoeuvres

Double Jump - Jump + Jump

Slam - Jump + Special Action

Cannonpaul - Enter a cannon
